name: Juri
title: The Arcane Kicker
subtitle: A deadly fighter who combines martial arts with arcane power
lore: A fierce taekwondo practitioner who has mastered the art of infusing her devastating kicks with arcane energy. Juri's unique ability to convert her physical attacks into magical damage makes her a formidable opponent who can bypass traditional defenses. Her aggressive fighting style and unpredictable nature strike fear into the hearts of her enemies.

passive.name: Arcane Strikes
passive.description: Juri's damage [60%] is converted to magic damage.

Q.name: Whirling Kick
Q.description: Juri spins and kicks with her legs, damaging all nearby enemies for [100/210/425/650/880] damage.

W.name: Mark of the Defender
W.description: When activated, if Juri is hit by an auto attack, she marks the attacking enemy for [5 seconds]. She can reactivate the ability to teleport behind the marked enemy. Juri gains one block against auto attacks for [5 seconds].

E.name: Jump Kick
E.description: Juri performs a jump kick in the targeted direction. Upon landing, she deals [110/210/360/580/830] damage in an area around her. Enemies in the center of the area are slowed by [50%] movement speed for [3 seconds].

R.name: Dragon Kick
R.description: Juri kicks a targeted enemy forward, dealing [600/850/1150] damage in the process.

1.name: Empowered Strikes
1.description: Juri's passive damage conversion is increased to [100%] by spells and [0%] by autoattacks.

1.name: Quickened Whirl
1.description: The cooldown of the Q ability is reduced from [10/10/9/8/8s] to [9/9/8/7/7s].

1.name: Keen Reflexes
1.description: Quest: Deal [10,000] damage with spells -> Juri's spells scale with [50%] AD.

5.name: Arcane Shield
5.description: Juri gains a shield based on [50%] of her magic damage dealt.

5.name: Mana Surge
5.description: Juri's Mana scaling changes to [200] and she loses [2s] cooldown on each of her spells.

10.name: Unstoppable Will
10.description: Juri gains [1s] damage immunity after she uses her R spell.

10.name: Enhanced Mark
10.description: Juri can reactivate her W on the kicked target for [5s].

15.name: Swift Kicks
15.description: Juri's movement speed is increased by [10%].

20.name: Dragon's Fury
20.description: Dragon Kick now deals [20%] of the target's maximum health as bonus damage.

20.name: Arcane Overflow
20.description: Juri's spells have a [25%] chance to deal double damage.

20.name: Whirlwind Master
20.description: Whirling Kick gains an additional charge and its damage is increased by [15%].

20.name: Defensive Master
20.description: Mark of the Defender blocks [2] auto attacks and its cooldown is reduced by [3s].
